memberdef.argsstring: (GntEntry *entry, GntEntryAction action, const char *text, int len)
memberdef.name: update_kill_ring

memberdef.argsstring: (GntWidget *widget, GntMouseEvent event, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: gnt_entry_clicked

parameterdescription.para: The text in the new entry box.

detaileddescription.para: Set the text in an entry box.

parameterdescription.para: The text to set in the box.

detaileddescription.para: Set the maximum length of the text in the entry box.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum length for text. A value of 0 means infinite length.
The flags to set for the entry box.

detaileddescription.para: Get the text in an entry box.

simplesect.para: The current text in the entry box.

detaileddescription.para: Clear the text in the entry box.
Set whether the text in the entry box should be masked for display.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the text should be masked, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Add a text to the history list for the text. The history length for the entry box needs to be set first by gnt_entry_set_history_length.

parameterdescription.para: A new entry for the history list.

detaileddescription.para: Set the length of history for the entry box.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum length of the history.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether the suggestions are for the entire entry box, or for each individual word in the entry box.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the suggestions are for individual words, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether to always display the suggestions list, or only when the tab-completion key is pressed (the TAB key, by default).

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the suggestion list should always be displayed.

detaileddescription.para: Add an item to the suggestion list.

parameterdescription.para: An item to add to the suggestion list.

detaileddescription.para: Remove an entry from the suggestion list.

parameterdescription.para: The item to remove from the suggestion list.
